thumb.name: A Memory Isn't Enough Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EMemories can't take your place...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EI miss you.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Meet for a Cool Drink Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EIt's almost Autumn%3Cbr%3Ebut it's still so hot!%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWe must get together soon%3Cbr%3Efor a cool drink.%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: Star %26 Hearts
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EJust for You. Dana We always have a lot of fun Whenever we're together%26#133%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3EThat's why I wish the time we share Could last until forever!%3Cbr%3E

thumb.name: In My Thoughts Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EYou're in my thoughts...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...today and always.

thumb.name: Remember Me? Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EHey. Adrian --%3Cbr%3ERemember me?%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E[PETER MARTIN]%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EWhaddya mean --%3Cbr%3EPeter Martin who?

thumb.name: Perky! Add-a-Photo
thumb.verse: %3Cb%3ECover Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3EStephanie.%3Cbr%3EJust thinking of you...%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cb%3EInside Verse:%3C/b%3E%3Cbr%3E%3Cbr%3E...always perks me up!
